price: Yeroma qamiisni isaa gara duubatiin kan baqaqfame ta’uu argu, (dhirsi ishee) ni jedhe: “Dhugumatti, inni kun tooftaa keessan (dubartootaa) irraayyi. Dhugumatti, tooftaan keessan guddaadha.
arabic: فَلَمَّا رَءَا قَمِيصَهُۥ قُدَّ مِن دُبُرٖ قَالَ إِنَّهُۥ مِن كَيۡدِكُنَّۖ إِنَّ كَيۡدَكُنَّ عَظِيمٞ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: falammā raā qamīṣahu qudda min duburin qāla innahu min kaydikunna inna kaydakunna ʿaẓīmun
